summary: Vaudeville is a type of theater that started in France in the 1800s. It's like a big variety show with lots of different acts. These acts could include comedians, dancers, singers, magicians, and even trained animals. Vaudeville became super popular in the United States and Canada from the 1880s to the 1930s. It was like a mix of comedy, music, and other fun performances all in one show. People who perform in vaudeville are called "vaudevillians."
title: Vaudeville
